Solution for playing Blu-ray folders with PowerDVD:

You need the following folder structure:

BDMV
----AUXDATA
----BACKUP
----------BDJO
----------CLIPINF
----------JAR
----------PLAYLIST
----BDJO
----CLIPINF
----JAR
----META
----PLAYLIST
----STREAM
CERTIFICATE

For this release, just create an empty folder called "AUXDATA" inside the "BDMV" folder and it will play perfectly.
